DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Efficacy , Tolerability & Safety Combination Clindamycin 100mg Ketoconazole 400mg Vaginal Capsules , use 7 consecutive day patient Mixed-Type Vaginosis compare Combination Tetracycline 100mg Amphotericin B 50mg Vaginal Cream .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Efficacy , Tolerability & Safety Combination Clindamycin Ketoconazole Treatment Mixed-Type Vaginosis , Bacterial Vaginosis Candidiasis
DOC.criteria: Mixedtype vaginosis Bacterial vaginosis Candidiasis Pregnancy Vaginal bleed History recurrent vaginosis
